name: Civil Matters
description:
Civil Matters is a 2D Top-Down single-player game that explores a world with civil unrest between the police and protestors. The player, as the protestor, walks around in a realistic depiction of a protest.  The conversations with NPC's expressing their thoughts and feelings related to police brutality.  By the end of the game, the player will have decided the fate of the city with a bad or good ending based on dialogue.

Controls: WASD to move, spacebar to interact, mouse to click.

Please note this is a Demo.
